articles.title: Sensex Dives Over 1,200 Points Amid Weak Global Cues; Nifty Breaks Below 16,950 - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The Indian equity benchmarks plunged sharply on Thursday as global markets slipped. Asian shares fell to their lowest in more than 14 months, short-term U.S. yields rose to 23-month highs and the dollar strengthened after the Federal Reserve's chairman signal…
articles.content:
• Back home, as of 11:39 am, the 30-share BSE Sensex tanked 1,222 points or 2.11 per cent to 56,636; while the broader NSE Nifty nosedived 357 points or 2.07 per cent to 16,921.
